Name: Agent Focus: Nicole
Desc: Use it to obtain the Agent or unlock the Agent's Mindscapes.
Desc2:
Snapshots from Nicole's daily life and from in combat, recording important moments before and after she became an Agent.
These images also provide insights into her fighting style and favorite weapons, helping to better understand her strengths.

Nicole promises the storage drive is from a clean source, but upon opening the hidden files, you can still see some data that someone didn't have time to delete.
